tool.name: CollectWgsMetrics
tool.description: compute metrics for evaluating of whole genome sequencing experiments

param.name: inputFile
param.label: Select SAM/BAM dataset or dataset collection
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset

validator.message: A built-in reference genome is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: ref_file
param.label: Use the folloing dataset as the reference sequence
param.help: REFERENCE_SEQUENCE; You can upload a FASTA sequence to the history and use it as reference

param.name: minimum_mapping_quality
param.label: Minimum mapping quality for a read to contribute coverage

param.name: minimum_base_quality
param.label: Minimum base quality for a base to contribute coverage

param.name: coverage_cap
param.label: Treat bases with coverage exceeding this value as if they had coverage at this value
